template.name: and_energy
template.value:
<!-- TODO : put following in the file : res/values/colors.xml <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="energyLabel">#FFFFFF</color>
<color name="energyClassAppp">#00a654</color> <color name="energyClassApp">#50b849</color> <color name="energyClassAp">#c0d731</color> <color name="energyClassA">#fef200</color> <color name="energyClassB">#fcb913</color> <color name="energyClassC">#f37020</color> <color name="energyClassD">#ff0000</color> <color name="energyClassSelected">#000000</color>
</resources> -->
<!-- TODO : put following in the file : res/values/dimens.xml <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <dimen name="energy_class_height">20dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_class_margin">5dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_class_padding">3dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_class_text_size">14dp</dimen>
<dimen name="energy_selected_width">50dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_appp_width">60dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_app_width">70dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_ap_width">80dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_a_width">90dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_b_width">100dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_c_width">110dp</dimen> <dimen name="energy_d_width">120dp</dimen>
</resources> -->
<!-- TODO : put following in the file : res/values/styles.xml <resources>
<style name="Energy" > <item name="android:padding">@dimen/energy_class_padding</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/energyLabel</item> <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/energy_class_text_size</item> <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item> </style>
</resources> -->
<!--INFO: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2517589/making-a-triangle-shape-using-xml-definitions--> <!-- TODO : put following in the file : res/drawable/arrow.xml <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <item> <rotate android:fromDegrees="45" android:toDegrees="45" android:pivotX="13%" android:pivotY="-40%"> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="#000" /> </shape> </rotate> </item> </layer-list> -->
<!-- TODO : put following in the file : res/drawable/arrow_left.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <item> <rotate android:fromDegrees="45" android:toDegrees="45" android:pivotX="87%" android:pivotY="140%"> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="#000" /> </shape> </rotate> </item> </layer-list> -->
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="220dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassAppp" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_appp_width" android:layout_height="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/energy_class_margin" android:background="@color/energyClassAppp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassApppArrow" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_height="0dp" android:background="@drawable/arrow" android:backgroundTint="@color/energyClassAppp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassAppp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf="@id/energyClassAppp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassAppp" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassApp" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_app_width" android:layout_height="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/energy_class_margin" android:background="@color/energyClassApp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassAppp" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassAppArrow" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/arrow" android:backgroundTint="@color/energyClassApp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassApp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf="@id/energyClassApp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassApp" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassAp" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_ap_width" android:layout_height="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/energy_class_margin" android:background="@color/energyClassAp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassApp" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassApArrow" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/arrow" android:backgroundTint="@color/energyClassAp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassAp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf="@id/energyClassAp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassAp" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassA" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_a_width" android:layout_height="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/energy_class_margin" android:background="@color/energyClassA" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassAp" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassAArrow" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/arrow" android:backgroundTint="@color/energyClassA" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassA" app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf="@id/energyClassA" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassA" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassB" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_b_width" android:layout_height="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/energy_class_margin" android:background="@color/energyClassB" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassA" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassBArrow" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/arrow" android:backgroundTint="@color/energyClassB" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassB" app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf="@id/energyClassB" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassB" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassC" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_c_width" android:layout_height="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/energy_class_margin" android:background="@color/energyClassC" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassB" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassCArrow" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/arrow" android:backgroundTint="@color/energyClassC" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassC" app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf="@id/energyClassC" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassC" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassD" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_d_width" android:layout_height="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/energy_class_margin" android:background="@color/energyClassD" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassC" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassDArrow" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/arrow" android:backgroundTint="@color/energyClassD" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassD" app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf="@id/energyClassD" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassD" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/energyClassApppLabel" style="@style/Energy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="A+++" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassAppp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="@id/energyClassAppp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassAppp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/energyClassAppLabel" style="@style/Energy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="A++" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassApp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="@id/energyClassApp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassApp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/energyClassApLabel" style="@style/Energy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="A+" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassAp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="@id/energyClassAp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassAp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/energyClassALabel" style="@style/Energy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="A" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassA" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="@id/energyClassA" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassA" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/energyClassBLabel" style="@style/Energy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="B" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassB" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="@id/energyClassB" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassB" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/energyClassCLabel" style="@style/Energy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="C" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassC" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="@id/energyClassC" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassC" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/energyClassDLabel" style="@style/Energy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="D" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassD" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="@id/energyClassD" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassD" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassApppSelected" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_selected_width" android:layout_height="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_marginTop="25dp" android:background="@color/energyClassSelected" app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<View android:id="@+id/energyClassApppSelectedArrow" android:layout_width="@dimen/energy_class_height" android:layout_height="20dp" android:background="@drawable/arrow_left" android:backgroundTint="@color/energyClassSelected" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassApppSelected" app:layout_constraintRight_toLeftOf="@id/energyClassApppSelected" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassApppSelected" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/energyClassSelectedLabel" style="@style/Energy" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="A+++" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/energyClassApppSelected" app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="@id/energyClassApppSelected" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/energyClassApppSelected" />
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Group android:id="@+id/body" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:constraint_referenced_ids="energyClassAppp, energyClassApp, energyClassAp, energyClassA, energyClassB, energyClassC, energyClassD" />
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Group android:id="@+id/arrow" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="visible" app:constraint_referenced_ids="energyClassApppArrow, energyClassAppArrow, energyClassApArrow, energyClassBArrow, energyClassAArrow, energyClassCArrow, energyClassDArrow" />
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Group android:id="@+id/text" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:constraint_referenced_ids="energyClassApppLabel, energyClassAppLabel, energyClassApLabel, energyClassALabel, energyClassBLabel, energyClassCLabel, energyClassDLabel" tools:visibility="visible" />
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Group android:id="@+id/energyClassSelectedAppp" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:constraint_referenced_ids="energyClassApppSelected, energyClassApppSelectedArrow, energyClassSelectedLabel" tools:visibility="visible" /> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

template.name: and_material_design_edittext
template.value:
<!-- TODO : NOTE : Enter the element name --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/$file_name$_$type$_$name$_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/$res_string_name$">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/$file_name$_$type$_$name$" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>

template.name: and_constraint_layout_center
template.description: Center an item in the middle of a Constraint Layout

template.name: and_material_design_switch
template.value:
<com.google.android.material.switchmaterial.SwitchMaterial
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:text="@string/label_1"/>

<!-- Code to handle it:
 // To check a switch
switchMaterial.isChecked = true

// To listen for a switch's checked/unchecked state changes
switchMaterial.setOnCheckedChangeListener { buttonView, isChecked
    // Responds to switch being checked/unchecked
}
-->

template.name: and_material_design_slider
template.value:
<!-- Continuous slider -->
<com.google.android.material.slider.Slider
    android:valueFrom="0.0"
    android:valueTo="100.0"  />

<!-- Discrete slider -->
<com.google.android.material.slider.Slider
    android:valueFrom="0.0"
    android:valueTo="100.0"
    android:stepSize="10.0"  />

<!-- Code to handle it:
slider.addOnSliderTouchListener(object : Slider.OnSliderTouchListener {
    override fun onStartTrackingTouch(slider: Slider) {
        // Responds to when slider's touch event is being started
    }

    override fun onStopTrackingTouch(slider: Slider) {
        // Responds to when slider's touch event is being stopped
    }
})

slider.addOnChangeListener { slider, value, fromUser ->
    // Responds to when slider's value is changed
}
-->

template.name: and_material_design_progress
template.value:
<!-- Linear progress indicator --> <com.google.android.material.progressindicator.LinearProgressIndicator android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" /> <!-- Circular progress indicator --> <com.google.android.material.progressindicator.CircularProgressIndicator android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<!-- Linear progress indicator --> <com.google.android.material.progressindicator.LinearProgressIndicator android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:indeterminate="true" /> <!-- Circular progress indicator --> <com.google.android.material.progressindicator.CircularProgressIndicator android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:indeterminate="true" />
template.description: Create a Material Design progress indicator.
